name: aws-multiregion-api
description: Deploy a cross-region serverless API with a global DynamoDB table

scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules/ reports/ sam/*-out.yaml sam/dist.zip
scripts.zip: npx rimraf sam/dist.zip && npm prune --production && npm dedupe && scripts/npm/zip.sh
scripts.package: npm run zip && npm run cf:package $1
scripts.deploy:test: npm run config test.us-west-2 && npm run package application && npm run cf:deploy application && date

author: James R. Gisler
